main event: An observer reported seeing a silvery disc-shaped object hovering close to his car in Castleton, New York on August 2, 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed for over 2 minutes,The observer described the object as having a slight indentation in the center and being silver in color,The object was about the size of a 6-inch pencil held at arm's length,There were no markings or sound associated with the object,The object's flight path was from west to east before it vanished behind a hill.
witness description: A 43-year-old conductor on the New York Central Railroad
